Text:
More info.

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Popcorn_%28instrumental%29

or download all versions here

http://www.popcorn-song.com/
The versions at popcorn-song.com aren't the full versions. But it's a great site about the best melody ever composed!

Dude, you're missing THE best version!

M&H Band - Popcorn (Remix Version Special DJ)

Often found under the name of Jean Michel Jarre, it's 6:59 long (can also be found as 6:57 long, with a slight glitch somewhere in the song), and I haven't been able to find it in any other bitrate than 128kbps. It's mentioned on the site http://www.popcorn-song.com/

twinrehz, The H&M version is there.
As you mentioned about the mistakes that it's composed by Jarre (listed as 06), there's the mistake that it's composed by kraftwerk also (listed as 09 above).
Neither of these two groups/musicians have done covers of popcorn so propaply both (06 and 09 is H&M)

But for me the original will always be the one with hot butter.

Keep poppin....
you can get 79 on this site; http://blog.wfmu.org/freeform/2007/03/79_versions_of_.html
And I thought the original version was one version too many... sigh..
nice torrent:D qlty good and download fast... i sure love the popcorn-song best... or something like that??
I'm looking for the Hot Butter - Popcorn (Techno Mix). Apparently from my findings, there isn't a single torrent what has it. CAN SOMEONE PLEASE GIVE ME A LINK to that song..
The version by Fiddler's Green is missing. Besides the original, that's the best one :)
Popcorn-tastic!!! Hot Butter is the best, now all I need is a plate of English muffins and a movie...

Man.. I'm missing the surf style version by the Treble Spankers 
In my opinion the best version of this song
